posts.content:
I'm thinking of selling my 1958 samba as i have not got the time to complete this project i ran this bus for 6 years before starting the project, the bus requires new rooflight welding in, 1 side allready done and yes i do have the other panel also needs new dogleg putting in which i do have as well, i have started to rub the paintwork down so this also needs completing.
on the good side i have everything to finish the bus all the interiors complete and retrimmed in cream leatherette with tan piping also on all door cards. it also has 6 pop outs+polished safaris+all the glass is also tinted green through out,gene berg shifter is also fitted, the bus itself has straight axle fitted along with a gt gearbox and t3 rear end for bigger brakes, on the front the beam as been lowered but i would recommend a new1,and i have all the deluxe trim vent etc it will come with a 1600 engine that runs.
I'm looking for around 15k if your serious about looking for a van i will post you pics at the weekend also you can get me on 07810352040 and i'm based in doncaster s/yorkshire.

mate,,,have you got photos,,,that would help nicely,,cheers
are you based where?
tx
Mate... No pics as I'm not sure how to post them hence why I said I'll email pics no problem. Distination is still the same in advert if you care to read it all?

oh man you sold it ! Well good for you Wayne . there was me, with my little pipe dream thinking ooh this could be it .... a samba.... pop

oh well back to the

devon project
sundial project
siva saluki project.........
that was quick i'll have to get my skates on next time
